description: Optional house rules for additional Near-Human traits. Set 'enabled': true to include these traits in character creation.

traits.name: Adaptive Resilience
traits.description: Once per encounter, increase one defense (Fortitude, Reflex, or Will) by 2 against a single attack or effect. Reflects near-human ability to adapt to threats.

traits.name: Hybrid Vitality
traits.description: Combine two different environmental or physiological adaptations. Start with Climb Speed AND Low-Light Vision, or Amphibious AND Natural Armor, etc. Choose two compatible traits at character creation.

traits.name: Mental Discipline
traits.description: Once per encounter, increase Will Defense by 2 against one attack or effect, or reroll a single Deception or Persuasion check (must accept result). Represents enhanced mental fortitude.

traits.name: Metabolic Flexibility
traits.description: Can consume half rations and require only 4 hours of sleep instead of 8. Can also reroll an Endurance check once per day.

traits.name: Hybrid Intelligence
traits.description: Gain +2 species bonus to one Knowledge skill and one Profession skill. Reflects diverse genetic heritage providing multiple areas of expertise.

traits.name: Chameleon Adaptation
traits.description: Gain +2 species bonus to Stealth and can take 10 on Stealth checks when relaxed. Skin/appearance naturally blends with surroundings.

traits.name: Dual Reflexes
traits.description: Increases Base Initiative by +1 and gain +1 species bonus to Reflex Defense. Represents faster nerve conduction from mixed genetics.

traits.name: Generalist Mastery
traits.description: Choose any 2 different Class Skills from different classes (Jedi, Soldier, Scoundrel, etc.). Those skills are considered class skills for you even if not normally available.

traits.name: Synthetic Resonance
traits.description: Can interact with droids and technology as if proficient with cybernetics. Gain +2 species bonus to Use Computer and Mechanics checks. Result of mixed human/synthetic ancestry.

traits.name: Second Wind (Enhanced)
traits.description: Gain an extra use of Second Wind per day (total of 2 instead of 1). Represents enhanced physical recovery from hybrid genetics.

variants.name: Luminous Skin
variants.description: Skin naturally produces bioluminescence in various colors. Can dim/brighten as an action. No mechanical effect unless GM allows (roleplay only).

variants.name: Crystalline Features
variants.description: Parts of body have crystalline growths (hair, skin, nails). Purely cosmetic but visually striking. Does not affect armor or weapons.

variants.name: Vestigial Wings
variants.description: Small non-functional wings (bat-like, insect-like, or avian). Provide no flight capability but give dramatic appearance. GM may allow +1 bonus to Acrobatics in specific situations.

variants.name: Hybrid Bio-Pattern
variants.description: Body displays obvious mixed genetic traits (different skin tones in sections, mixed fur patterns, etc.). Striking appearance grants advantage in social situations where unique heritage is valued.
